urls.title: Get Involved | Yorkshire & Humberside Climate Commission
urls.description: Yorkshire and Humber Climate Commission is an independent, evolving organisation that will develop over the next few months. We are currently recruiting for a Chair - applications for Commissioners have now closed. We are seeking to appoint a Chair for the Commission, an individual with a proven track record in leadership who can demonstrate an in-depth understanding of the climate emergency and the potential responses to it within the region. In line with the Commission‚Äôs objectives, they should have a
